title: My master saved a man by faking a report. Now he’s making me sign it. What should I do?
author: student-mavir
body: I’m stuck. Writing here because there’s no one else to ask for advice...

comments.author: deicide-mentor
comments.body: sign it rookie. rules are for those who sit in offices. the old man was “in the field.” he did what had to be done. period.

comments.author: supervisor-riggs
comments.body: Citizen Mavir. Your public appeal has been recorded and is sufficient grounds to initiate an internal investigation of Master Gideon for violations of articles 7.14 and 12.3. Thank you for your cooperation. Expect a summons to give testimony.

replies.author: student-mavir
replies.body: I… I was just asking for advice!

replies.author: assi-the-runner
replies.body: nice one, student. snitched on yourself. saved the control guys some paperwork ;) they’ll give themselves a bonus.

comments.author: operator-brokk7
comments.body: I’m Brokk. This is about me. My daughter sent me the link. Master Gideon, thank you. And you, student… I don’t know what you’ll decide. But I’m home now, hugging my youngest. She asked me to tell you you’ve got kind eyes. Please don’t sign. But don’t snitch either. Just burn that damned form.

replies.author: meme-smith
replies.body: guys I’m crying 😭 what a story… riggs you’ve got no heart 💔 student burn the paper!! 🔥🔥🔥

comments.author: master-gideon
comments.body: The choice is always yours, kid. I made mine. You make yours. Just remember: any protocol is dead until there’s a living person’s signature under it. And responsibility for it.
